title: The Symbiotic Struggles of Yahoo! Inc. (YHOO) and Alibaba Group Holding Ltd (BABA) (Usman Rafi/Insider Monkey)
content:
The Symbiotic Struggles of Yahoo! Inc. (YHOO) and Alibaba Group Holding Ltd (BABA)      
Two tech companies, Yahoo! Inc. (NASDAQ:YHOO) and Alibaba Group Holding
Ltd (NYSE:BABA), which have seen much better days, continue to struggle.
Both stocks have lost ground since the beginning of the year amid a
string of negative news, such as the recent refusal by the IRS regarding
a private...
